functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: What are the five most popular grape varieties from the Bordeaux appellation, and which area of Bordeaux are they most planted in?

msg.name: search

msg.content: It seems there is no specific article on the popular grape varieties in Bordeaux. However, based on general knowledge, the five most popular grape varieties from the Bordeaux appellation are Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec, Sauvignon Blanc, and Cabernet Franc. These grape varieties are most planted in different areas of Bordeaux, with Merlot being predominant on the right bank, Cabernet Sauvignon in the left bank, Malbec in the Blaye and Bourg regions, Sauvignon Blanc in the Graves and Entre-Deux-Mers regions, and Cabernet Franc in various parts of Bordeaux.

However, based on general knowledge, the five most popular grape varieties from the Bordeaux appellation are Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec, Sauvignon Blanc, and Cabernet Franc. These grape varieties are most planted in different areas of Bordeaux, with Merlot being predominant on the right bank, Cabernet Sauvignon in the left bank, Malbec in the Blaye and Bourg regions, Sauvignon Blanc in the Graves and Entre-Deux-Mers regions, and Cabernet Franc in various parts of Bordeaux.
